message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.GT 

The paper deals with online optimization and decision-making under uncertainty, which are core topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of Bayesian methods and information theory also suggests a connection to the fields of information theory (cs.IT) and game theory (cs.GT). The focus on regret analysis and optimization algorithms further suggests a connection to the subfield of machine learning theory (cs.LG) and the subfield of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
